title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add remaining tikka masala spice and cook for 1 minute.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a bowl, mash garlic and anchovies into a paste.
Whisk in egg yolk, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking to create an emulsion.
Season dressing with salt and pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Top with croutons and Parmesan shavings, serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: A rich, moist chocolate cake with a smooth chocolate frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch cake pans.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
Add eggs, buttermilk, coffee, oil, and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes.
Pour batter into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then remove to wire racks.
Frost with your favorite chocolate frosting when completely cool.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection with a lemon butter sauce.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Place salmon skin-side down on the grill.
Grill for 4-6 minutes per side until fish flakes easily.
While salmon cooks, melt butter in a small pan.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute, then add lemon juice.
Drizzle lemon butter sauce over grilled salmon, garnish with dill and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add harder vegetables (broccoli, carrots) first, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add softer vegetables (bell pepper, snap peas), stir-fry for 2 more minutes.
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch with 2 tbsp water.
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat.
Cook for 1 minute until sauce thickens, serve over rice.
